comment: /**  * Return the explanation for shard allocation in the cluster  */
code: /**  * Return the explanation for shard allocation in the cluster  */ public ClusterAllocationExplanation getExplanation() {     return this.cae. }
@Override public void readFrom(StreamInput in) throws IOException {     super.readFrom(in).     this.cae = new ClusterAllocationExplanation(in). }
@Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     cae.writeTo(out). }
